headline: Lehman warns of Q4 losses
description: Lehman Brothers warned investors of potential fourth-quarter losses

headline: Bear Stearns rescued by JPMorgan
description: JPMorgan acquired Bear Stearns with Federal Reserve backing

headline: Lehman reports $2.8B loss
description: Lehman Brothers reported a $2.8 billion quarterly loss

headline: BofA backs out of Lehman deal
description: Bank of America withdrew from negotiations to acquire Lehman

headline: Lehman Brothers files for bankruptcy
description: Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection

headline: Markets plunge on Lehman bankruptcy
description: Global stock markets fell sharply following Lehman's bankruptcy filing

headline: Fed bails out AIG
description: Federal Reserve provided $85 billion bailout to AIG
